description: We are looking for a skilled Software Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications using modern technologies.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. 3+ years of experience with JavaScript, TypeScript, and Angular. Experience with .NET Core is a plus.
coverLetter: Dear Hiring Manager, I am writing to express my strong interest in the Software Developer position at Tech Solutions Inc. With over 3 years of experience in web development and a passion for creating innovative solutions, I believe I would be a valuable addition to your team.

description: Join our creative team as a Frontend Developer. You'll work on exciting projects for various clients, creating beautiful and functional user interfaces.
requirements: 2+ years of experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React or Angular. Experience with responsive design and modern CSS frameworks.
coverLetter: I am excited to apply for the Frontend Developer position at Digital Agency. My experience in creating responsive, user-friendly interfaces aligns perfectly with your team's needs.
